data.title: GET CARTER
data.meta_description: GET CARTER  Arnaldo Putzu (1927-2012), Directed by: Mike Hodges, Starring: Michael Caine, Ian Hendry, Britt Ekland  1971, M.G.M., British quad, condition A-; backed on linen  30 x 40in. (76 x 102cm.)
data.text:
The condition of lots can vary widely and the nature of the lots sold means that they are unlikely to be in a perfect condition. Lots are sold in the condition they are in at the time of sale.

Condition A-: One horizontal and three vertical fold lines, horizontal line double creased, re-touching to fold lines, minor re-touching to 2Â½x1in. area of wear to upper left corner, image and colours otherwise excellent, backed on linen.

Note: The condition of lots sold can vary widely due to factors such as age, previous damage, restoration, repair and wear and tear. The nature of the lots sold means that they will rarely be in perfect condition. Lots are sold in the condition they are in at the time of the sale.

Print Report
